verses.verse: And Bildad the Shuhite answered, saying:
Until when will you speak these things, and the words of your mouth will be like a mighty wind?
Or does God pervert judgment? Or does the Almighty pervert the right?
If your sons have sinned against Him, and if He has sent them away in the hand of their transgression,
if you would diligently seek to God, and make your prayer to the Almighty,
if you were pure and upright, surely now He would rise for you, and make peaceful the abode of your righteousness.
And though your beginning was small, even your end would greatly increase.
For please ask of the former generation, and prepare to the search of their fathers;
for we are but of yesterday, and we do not know, because our days on earth are a shadow.
Shall they not teach you, speak to you, and bring forth words out of their heart?
Can the rush grow up without mire? Can the reed grass grow without water?
While it is yet in its greenness, and not cut down, it dries out before every plant;
so are the paths of all those forgetting God; yea, the hope of the godless one shall perish,
whose hope is cut off, and his trust is as a spider's house.
He shall lean on his house, but it shall not stand; he shall hold fast to it, but it shall not rise up.
He is moist before the sun, and his tender plants shoot forth on his garden.
His roots are wrapped around a heap; he sees a house of stones.
If one swallows him from his place, even it shall deny him, saying, I have not seen you!
Behold this is the joy of His way, and out of the dust others shall grow.
Behold, God will not reject the perfect one, and He will not strengthen the hand of evildoers,
until He fills your mouth with laughter and your lips with rejoicing.
Those who hate you shall be clothed with shame; and the tent of the wicked one shall not be.
